description: Try our easy to follow Witches' Brooms recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Snack,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Budget,Healthier Halloween,Soy free,Halloween,Peanut free
name: Witches' Brooms Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the soft green end of the spring onion into 15cm long, thin strips (you will need 24 strips). Place into a small bowl and cover with boiling water to soften. Set aside.

Remove cheese sticks from packaging and cut in half. Peel bottom half of each piece to form bristles. Using a thick skewer, make a hole in the top end, 1cm deep. Insert a pretzel stick into each, being careful not to push in too far and split the cheese (see tip).
Drain spring onion and pat dry. Wrap around the top of the cheese and tie a knot. Trim ends and serve.
